articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Fitbit founders launch AI platform to help families monitor their health - TechCrunch
articles.description: Luffu uses AI in the background to gather and organize family information, learn day-to-day patterns, and flag notable changes so families can stay aligned and address potential well-being issues.
articles.content: Fitbit founders James Park and Eric Friedman have announced the launch of a new AI startup called Luffu that aims to help families proactively monitor their health. The duo are developing an “intelli… [+2336 chars]
